程序包 org.tron.trident.crypto.tuwenitypes

接口 MutableBytes

所有超级接口:
Bytes, Comparable<Bytes>
所有已知子接口:

所有已知实现类:
MutableByteBufferWrappingBytes
public interface MutableBytes extends Bytes
A mutable Bytes value.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static final MutableBytes
    EMPTY
    The empty value (with 0 bytes).

    • EMPTY

      static final MutableBytes EMPTY
      The empty value (with 0 bytes).

  • 方法详细资料

    • create

      static MutableBytes create(int size)
      Create a new mutable byte value.
      参数:
      size - The size of the returned value.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.

    • wrap

      static MutableBytes wrap(byte[] value)
      Wrap a byte array in a MutableBytes value.
      参数:
      value - The value to wrap.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value wrapping value.

    • wrap

      static MutableBytes wrap(byte[] value, int offset, int length)
      Wrap a slice of a byte array as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that value is not copied and thus any future update to value within the slice will be reflected in the returned value.

      参数:
      value - The value to wrap.
      offset - The index (inclusive) in value of the first byte exposed by the returned value. In other words, you will have wrap(value, o, l).get(0) == value[o].
      length - The length of the resulting value.
      返回:
      A Bytes value that expose the bytes of value from offset (inclusive) to offset + length (exclusive).
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset < 0 || (value.length > 0 && offset >= value.length).
      IllegalArgumentException - if length < 0 || offset + length > value.length.

    • wrapBuffer

      static MutableBytes wrapBuffer(io.vertx.core.buffer.Buffer buffer)
      Wrap a full Vert.x Buffer as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value.

      参数:
      buffer - The buffer to wrap.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.

    • wrapBuffer

      static MutableBytes wrapBuffer(io.vertx.core.buffer.Buffer buffer, int offset, int size)
      Wrap a slice of a Vert.x Buffer as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value, and any change to the returned value will be reflected in the buffer.

      参数:
      buffer - The buffer to wrap.
      offset - The offset in buffer from which to expose the bytes in the returned value. That is, wrapBuffer(buffer, i, 1).get(0) == buffer.getByte(i).
      size - The size of the returned value.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset < 0 || (buffer.length() > 0 && offset >= buffer.length()).
      IllegalArgumentException - if length < 0 || offset + length > buffer.length().

    • wrapByteBuf

      static MutableBytes wrapByteBuf(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf byteBuf)
      Wrap a full Netty ByteBuf as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value.

      参数:
      byteBuf - The ByteBuf to wrap.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.

    • wrapByteBuf

      static MutableBytes wrapByteBuf(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf byteBuf, int offset, int size)
      Wrap a slice of a Netty ByteBuf as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value, and any change to the returned value will be reflected in the buffer.

      参数:
      byteBuf - The ByteBuf to wrap.
      offset - The offset in byteBuf from which to expose the bytes in the returned value. That is, wrapByteBuf(byteBuf, i, 1).get(0) == byteBuf.getByte(i).
      size - The size of the returned value.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset < 0 || (byteBuf.capacity() > 0 && offset >= byteBuf.capacity()).
      IllegalArgumentException - if length < 0 || offset + length > byteBuf.capacity().

    • wrapByteBuffer

      static MutableBytes wrapByteBuffer(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Wrap a full Java NIO ByteBuffer as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value.

      参数:
      byteBuffer - The ByteBuffer to wrap.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.

    • wrapByteBuffer

      static MutableBytes wrapByteBuffer(ByteBuffer byteBuffer, int offset, int size)
      Wrap a slice of a Java NIO ByteBuffer as a MutableBytes value.

      Note that any change to the content of the buffer may be reflected in the returned value, and any change to the returned value will be reflected in the buffer.

      参数:
      byteBuffer - The ByteBuffer to wrap.
      offset - The offset in byteBuffer from which to expose the bytes in the returned value. That is, wrapByteBuffer(byteBuffer, i, 1).get(0) == byteBuffer.getByte(i).
      size - The size of the returned value.
      返回:
      A MutableBytes value.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset < 0 || (byteBuffer.limit() > 0 && offset >= byteBuffer.limit()).
      IllegalArgumentException - if length < 0 || offset + length > byteBuffer.limit().

    • of

      static MutableBytes of(byte... bytes)
      Create a value that contains the specified bytes in their specified order.
      参数:
      bytes - The bytes that must compose the returned value.
      返回:
      A value containing the specified bytes.

    • of

      static MutableBytes of(int... bytes)
      Create a value that contains the specified bytes in their specified order.
      参数:
      bytes - The bytes.
      返回:
      A value containing bytes are the one from bytes.
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the specified would be truncated when storing as a byte.

    • set

      void set(int i, byte b)
      Set a byte in this value.
      参数:
      i - The index of the byte to set.
      b - The value to set that byte to.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i < 0 or {i >= size()}.

    • set

      default void set(int offset, Bytes bytes)
      Set a byte in this value.
      参数:
      offset - The offset of the bytes to set.
      bytes - The value to set bytes to.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i < 0 or {i >= size()}.

    • setInt

      default void setInt(int i, int value)
      Set the 4 bytes starting at the specified index to the specified integer value.
      参数:
      i - The index, which must less than or equal to size() - 4.
      value - The integer value.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i < 0 or i > size() - 4.

    • setLong

      default void setLong(int i, long value)
      Set the 8 bytes starting at the specified index to the specified long value.
      参数:
      i - The index, which must less than or equal to size() - 8.
      value - The long value.
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i < 0 or i > size() - 8.

    • increment

      default MutableBytes increment()
      Increments the value of the bytes by 1, treating the value as big endian. If incrementing overflows the value then all bits flip, i.e. incrementing 0xFFFF will return 0x0000.
      返回:
      this value

    • decrement

      default MutableBytes decrement()
      Decrements the value of the bytes by 1, treating the value as big endian. If decrementing underflows the value then all bits flip, i.e. decrementing 0x0000 will return 0xFFFF.
      返回:
      this value

    • mutableSlice

      MutableBytes mutableSlice(int i, int length)
      Create a mutable slice of the bytes of this value.

      Note: the resulting slice is only a view over the original value. Holding a reference to the returned slice may hold more memory than the slide represents. Use Bytes.copy() on the returned slice to avoid this.

      参数:
      i - The start index for the slice.
      length - The length of the resulting value.
      返回:
      A new mutable view over the bytes of this value from index i (included) to index i + length (excluded).
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if length < 0.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i < 0 or {i >= size()} or {i + length > size()} .

    • fill

      default void fill(byte b)
      Fill all the bytes of this value with the specified byte.
      参数:
      b - The byte to use to fill the value.

    • clear

      default void clear()
      Set all bytes in this value to 0.
